zh-cn.scaleInfo: 会决定输出图片的尺寸。目前3X处理会耗时比较久，推荐2X
zh-cn.denoiseInfo: 降噪版: 如果原片噪声多，压得烂，推荐使用； 无降噪版：适合原图噪声不多，想提高分辨率/清晰度/做通用性的增强、修复处理； 保守版: 如果你担心丢失纹理，担心画风被改变，担心颜色被增强，总之就是各种担心AI会留下浓重的处理痕迹，推荐使用该版本
zh-cn.uploadText1: 点击或者拖动图片到该区域来上传
zh-cn.alertTitle: 本项目基于Web Assembly技术，在浏览器端使用CPU完成图像处理，不会上传任何图片到云端。
zh-cn.alertTip: 注意：本页面处理图片时占用内存约900M，且CPU占用较高。如果使用有问题，请在PC端使用最新版的Chrome打开本页面。如输出有问题或长时间无响应，请刷新重试。
zh-cn.resourcePreLoading: 启动中，预计10秒内完成耗时估算...
zh-cn.notSupport: 浏览器不支持{0} (不支持iOS，Android请单独用Chrome浏览器打开，桌面端请使用最新版本的Chrome)
zh-cn.memoryOutContent: 本页面多次处理图片后，触发了浏览器内存限制，请点击刷新按钮重试
zh-cn.wasmLoading: wasm 还未加载完成，请稍后再试
zh-cn.wasmError: wasm 发生错误，请刷新再试

en.scaleInfo: Will determine the size of the output picture.The current 3X processing will take a long time, it is recommended to 2X
en.denoiseInfo: Noise reduction version: If the original film is more noise, it is rotten, it is recommended to use; no noise reduction version: suitable for the original picture noise, want to improve the resolution/clarity/do the universal enhancement and repair processing; conservative version: ifYou are worried about the loss of texture, the style of painting is changed, and the color is increasing.
en.uploadText1: Click or drag the picture to the area to upload
en.uploadText2: You can only select JPG/PNG/Webp/BMP files
en.alertTitle: This project is based on Web Assembly technology. It uses a CPU to complete the image processing on the browser. It will not upload any picture to the cloud.
en.alertTip: Note: When processing the picture on this page, the memory is about 900m, and the CPU is high.If you have any problems, use the latest version of Chrome on the PC side to open this page.If there is a problem with the output or no response for a long time, please refresh it.
en.resourcePreLoading: During the start, it is expected to complete the time -consuming estimate within 10 seconds...
en.processingMsg: Local CPU work hard to handle ...
en.notSupport: The browser does not support {0} (iOS does not support iOS, Android, please use the Chrome browser alone, please use the latest version of Chrome)
en.memoryOutContent: After handling the pictures on this page multiple times, the browser memory limit is triggered, please click the refresh button to try it out
en.wasmLoading: WASM hasn't been loaded yet, please try again later
en.wasmError: WASM error, please refresh and try again
